description: Investors have been concerned about slow growth in Europe, but now they're looking at China—The country is going to have a hard time hitting its goal for growth it set for this year. More on that. Plus, we head to Staten Island to talk about how Ebola has had an economic impact one of the largest Liberian communities in America.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday October 21, 2014
byline: Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Nova Safo, Tracey Samuelson, David Gura and David Weinberg
teaser: Investors have been concerned about slow growth in Europe, but now they're looking at China—The country is going to have a hard time hitting its goal for growth it set for this year. More on that. Plus, we head to Staten Island to talk about how Ebola has had an economic impact one of the largest Liberian communities in America.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday October 21, 2014
